sentences.en: A wager is a fool's argument.
At the age of fifteen, for a wager, he was disguised as a girl.
sentences.cn: 十五岁时, 作为赌注, 他被打扮成个女孩.

sentences.en: I am ready to wager a package of cigarettes that he will come.
sentences.cn: 我敢打赌一盒香烟,他一定来.

sentences.en: I had naturally forgotten the joking wager.
sentences.cn: 我当然已忘掉那次玩笑式的打赌.

sentences.en: I made a wager that our team would win.
I wager ten dollars on it.
sentences.cn: 我对那件事下赌注十美元.

sentences.en: I wager that It'shall be so.
I'll wager she'll still make the same impact when she's 70.
sentences.cn: 我敢打赌，她就算到了70岁，影响力也会不减当年。

sentences.en: I'll wager you $ 100 that he is there.
sentences.cn: 我愿与你打赌一百元,他准在那儿.

sentences.en: I'll wager you do well for yourself in London.
sentences.cn: 我担保你在伦敦一定混得不错.

sentences.en: I'm ready to wager ( you ) ( a pound ) that our team will win the game.
sentences.cn: 我准备 ( 跟你 ) 打赌 ( 一英镑 ) 我们这一队会赢这场比赛.

sentences.en: Let my nephew and Goldthred swagger about their wager as they list.
sentences.cn: 让我外甥和戈德斯雷德去信口开河地打赌,随他们的便吧.

sentences.en: She was willing to wager that he didn't own the apartment he lived in.
sentences.cn: 她愿意打赌他居住的公寓并不属于他。

sentences.en: There have been various wagers on certain candidates since the senator announced his retirement.
sentences.cn: 自从那位参议员宣布引退之后，对某些候选人的打赌猜测纷纷出现。

sentences.en: They laid a wager on the result of the race.
sentences.cn: 他们以竞赛的结果打赌.

sentences.en: Would you care to place a small wager of $ 5 on it?
sentences.cn: 你愿不愿就此事打个五元的小赌?

trans.tran_en: an agreement in which you win or lose money according to the result of something such as a race
to agree to win or lose an amount of money on the result of something such as a race
